org.gradoop.flink.io.impl.csv.indexed.functions

Class MultipleFileOutputFormat<IT>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.flink.api.common.io.RichOutputFormat<IT>
      • org.gradoop.flink.io.impl.csv.indexed.functions.MultipleFileOutputFormat<IT>
  • Type Parameters:
    IT - used output format references to: org.apache.flink.api.common.io.FileOutputFormat;
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, org.apache.flink.api.common.io.CleanupWhenUnsuccessful, org.apache.flink.api.common.io.InitializeOnMaster, org.apache.flink.api.common.io.OutputFormat<IT>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    IndexedCSVFileFormat

    @Public
public abstract class MultipleFileOutputFormat<IT>
extends org.apache.flink.api.common.io.RichOutputFormat<IT>
implements org.apache.flink.api.common.io.InitializeOnMaster, org.apache.flink.api.common.io.CleanupWhenUnsuccessful
    The abstract base class for all Rich output formats that are file based. Contains the logic to open/close the target file streams. Feature to open several files concurrent.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • getAndCreateFileStream

        public org.apache.flink.core.fs.FSDataOutputStream getAndCreateFileStream(String label)
                                                                   throws IOException
        Get the stream to a specific filename. If no stream for this file already exist it will create a new stream to the actual file path in the file system for a file with this filename. Output is written to: outputPath/label/data.csv
        Parameters:
        label - the name of the file
        Returns:
        the output stream for the path
        Throws:
        IOException - - Thrown, if the output could not be opened due to an I/O problem.
